entry.title: 2023 News
entry.content:
March 28, 2023: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 01, 1982-0500 Visit to Wuhan, Hubei, China, link Chronology 1973.
March 26, 2023: Photos Post 10: Photos Moments of Joy, link Jai Shri Mataji or Sahaja Image Events (Step 4: third website managed by CCT).
March 20, 2023: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 01, 1973-0321 Birthday Pūjā, link Chronology 1973.
March 19, 2023: Divine Message, Version 8, link Divine Message, Version 8.
March 18, 2023: Saundaryalaharī started, link Saundaryalaharī.
March 17, 2023: ŚHRĪ ĀDINĀTH in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ started, link ŚHRĪ ĀDINĀTH.
March 16, 2023: First Annual Report of the Archives Subteam, link First Annual Report.
March 14, 2023: ŚHRĪ CONFUCIUS in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ up to date, link Śhrī Confucius.
March 12, 2023: Photos Post 8: Second Annual Report, link Photos.
March 11, 2023: Ātmabodha started, link Ātmabodha.
March 09, 2023: On the Comprehensive Compilation Team, link Miscellaneous Post 1.
March 08, 2023: compilation on Color, Frequency, Wavelength started, link Colors.
March 01, 2023: compilation on Photograph started, link Photograph.

February 26, 2023: The Analects started, link The Analects.
February 24, 2023: ŚHRĪ RĀMADĀS SWĀMĪ in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ, link Śhrī Rāmadās Swāmī.
February 22, 2023: compilation on Culture started, link Culture.
February 15, 2023: compilation on Alternative started, link Alternative.
February 12, 2023: ŚHRĪ NĀṆAKĪ in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ, link Śhrī Nāṇakī.
February 11, 2023: Vivekachūḍāmaṇi started, link Vivekachūḍāmaṇi.
February 08, 2023: compilation on Aims, Destinations, Goals, and Purposes started, link Aims.
February 04, 2023: Mārkaṇḍeya Purāṇa started, link Mārkaṇḍeya Purāṇa.
February 03, 2023: ŚHRĪ GUĀNYĪN in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ, link Śhrī Guānīn.
February 01, 2023: compilation on Commitments, Oaths, Pledges, Promises, Vows started, link Promises.

January 28, 2023: Guru Granth Sāhib started, link Guru Granth Sāhib.
January 27, 2023: ŚHRĪ SOPĀNDEV in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ, link Śhrī Sopāndev.
January 26, 2023: Personal Items Galleries started on Eternal Moments, link Personal Items, Moments of Joy Folder.
January 25, 2023: compilation on Vision started, link Vision.
January 22, 2023: the 27th Collection started on Eternal Moments, link Collections Folder.
January 21, 2023: Tao Te Ching started, link Tao Te Ching.
January 20, 2023: ŚHRĪ NIVṚITTINĀTH in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ, link Śhrī Nivṛittināth.
January 19, 2023: uploaded Letters and Press Releases started, link Letters and Press Releases.
January 18, 2023: compilation on Triśhaṅku and Southern Cross, link Triśhaṅku.
January 17, 2023: first News posted (this page).
January 16, 2023: Yearly Topics Team started the weakly Birthday Centenary posts, link Yearly.
January 15, 2023: Photos Post 7: Nonempty Chronology Galleries, link Photos.
January 14, 2023: the 26th Collection started on Eternal Moments, link Collections Folder.
January 14, 2023: first Photos from 1951 (confirmed) and 1974 (partially confirmed), link Chronology Folder.

March 26, 2023: Photos Post 10: Photos Moments of Joy, link Jai Shri Mataji or Sahaja Image Events (Step 4: third website managed by CCT). March 20, 2023: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 01, 1973-0321 Birthday Pūjā, link Chronology 1973. March 19, 2023: Divine Message, Version 8, link Divine Message, Version 8. March 18, 2023: Saundaryalaharī started, link Saundaryalaharī. March 17, 2023: ŚHRĪ ĀDINĀTH in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ started, link ŚHRĪ ĀDINĀTH. March 16, 2023: First Annual Report of the Archives Subteam, link First Annual Report. March 14, 2023: ŚHRĪ CONFUCIUS in the Words of ŚHRĪ MĀTĀJĪ up to date, link Śhrī Confucius. March 12, 2023: Photos Post 8: Second Annual Report, link Photos. March 11, 2023: Ātmabodha started, link Ātmabodha. March 09, 2023: On the Comprehensive Compilation Team, link Miscellaneous Post 1. March 08, 2023: compilation on Color, Frequency, Wavelength started, link Colors. March 01, 2023: compilation on Photograph started, link Photograph.
